fisica

Class FCircle

  • java.lang.Object
    • fisica.FDrawable
      • fisica.FBody
        • fisica.FCircle

  • public class FCircle
extends FBody
    Represents a circular body that can be added to a world. 
     
 FCircle myCircle = new FCircle(40);
 world.add(myCircle);
    See Also:
    FBox, FBlob, FPoly, FLine
